record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1913. Fourth row: N. B. Johnson, W. P. Comstock, H. E. Goettler, L. Campbell, and H. O. Page; third row: T. R. Stains, E. B. Thomas, J. R. Canning, H. S. Gorgas, P. R. Des Jardien, H. H. Cox, S. Sellers, and A. G. Duncan; second row: C. A. Boroff; first row: F. T. Ward, C. O. Parker, N. H. Norgren, G. E. Kuh (captain), R. D. Matthews, D. Knight, and J. W. Breathed.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
